welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Bessancourt, a charming city known for its quaint streets, delicious cuisine, and rich history. We hope you enjoy your stay and take the time to explore all that our beautiful city has to offer."

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for regional flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Le Bourget Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Le Bourget Airport, mainly used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The first and oldest terminal at Charles De Gaulle Airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The largest and busiest terminal at Charles De Gaulle Airport, divided into seven sub-terminals.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: A smaller terminal primarily used for low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but a premium option is also available for faster speeds.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Toussus-le-noble Airport serves all commercial flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Toussus-le-noble Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Orly Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Orly Airport, mainly used for low-cost and regional flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport with unlimited access.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Beauvais-Tille Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Beauvais-Tille Airport, primarily used for low-cost airlines and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport. Simply connect to the BVA-WIFI network and follow the instructions to access the internet.
